title: 旧约 - 民数记(Numbers) - 第 17 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 民数记(Numbers) -- 第 17 章 ( 本篇共有 36 章 )

lineList.en: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

Speak unto the children of Israel, and take of every one of them a rod according to the house of their fathers, of all their princes according to the house of their fathers twelve rods: write thou every man's name upon his rod.
lineList.cn: 你晓谕以色列人，从他们手下取杖，每支派一根。从他们所有的首领，按着支派，共取十二根。你要将各人的名字写在各人的杖上，

lineList.en: And thou shalt write Aaron's name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod shall be for the head of the house of their fathers.
lineList.cn: 并要将亚伦的名字写在利未的杖上，因为各族长必有一根杖。

lineList.en: And thou shalt lay them up in the tabernacle of the congregation before the testimony, where I will meet with you.
lineList.cn: 你要把这些杖存在会幕内法柜前，就是我与你们相会之处。

lineList.en: And it shall come to pass, that the man's rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, whereby they murmur against you.
lineList.cn: 后来我所拣选的那人，他的杖必发芽。这样，我必使以色列人向你们所发的怨言止息，不再达到我耳中。

lineList.en: And Moses spake unto the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers' houses, even twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron was among their rods.
lineList.cn: 于是摩西晓谕以色列人，他们的首领就把杖交给他，按着支派，每首领一根，共有十二根。亚伦的杖也在其中。

lineList.en: And Moses laid up the rods before the LORD in the tabernacle of witness.
lineList.cn: 摩西就把杖存在法柜的帐幕内，在耶和华面前。

lineList.en: And it came to pass, that on the morrow Moses went into the tabernacle of witness; and, behold, the rod of Aaron for the house of Levi was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds.
lineList.cn: 第二天，摩西进法柜的帐幕去。谁知利未族亚伦的杖已经发了芽，生了花苞，开了花，结了熟杏。

lineList.en: And Moses brought out all the rods from before the LORD unto all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.
lineList.cn: 摩西就把所有的杖从耶和华面前拿出来，给以色列众人看。他们看见了，各首领就把自己的杖拿去。

lineList.en: And the LORD said unto Moses, Bring Aaron's rod again before the testimony, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not.
lineList.cn: 耶和华吩咐摩西说，把亚伦的杖还放在法柜前，给这些背叛之子留作记号。这样，你就使他们向我发的怨言止息，免得他们死亡。

lineList.en: And Moses did so: as the LORD commanded him, so did he.
lineList.cn: 摩西就这样行。耶和华怎样吩咐他，他就怎样行了。

lineList.en: And the children of Israel spake unto Moses, saying, Behold, we die, we perish, we all perish.
lineList.cn: 以色列人对摩西说，我们死喇。我们灭亡喇。都灭亡喇。

lineList.en: Whosoever cometh any thing near unto the tabernacle of the LORD shall die: shall we be consumed with dying?
lineList.cn: 凡挨近耶和华帐幕的是必死的。我们都要死亡吗，
